summary: This is an email chain from July 2019 forwarding a message from an Assistant State Attorney in Palm Beach County seeking information about Jeffrey Epstein and potential victims for criminal charges related to crimes in Palm Beach County. It shows law enforcement outreach shortly before Epstein's arrest.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central subject of the email chain; the Assistant State Attorney is seeking information about crimes he may have committed in Palm Beach County.

events.title: State Attorney's Office outreach regarding Epstein
events.description: An Assistant State Attorney from Palm Beach County's Special Victim's Unit sends an email expressing interest in information that could lead to criminal charges against Jeffrey Epstein for crimes occurring in Palm Beach County and asks for victims to come forward.

keyFacts: The Office of the State Attorney for Palm Beach County was actively seeking information about Jeffrey Epstein in July 2019.
The inquiry specifically sought information about crimes that occurred in Palm Beach County that could lead to criminal charges.
The email asks for assistance in connecting with victims who would like to make statements to local law enforcement.
The communication shows ongoing investigative interest in Epstein by Florida authorities shortly before his July 2019 arrest.
The email includes a standard Florida public records law disclosure notice.
